alert.note: Alert for George (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 12:40PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mobile and southeastern George Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1240 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Big Point to 5 miles north of Alabama Port. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Prichard, Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Chickasaw, Grand Bay, Semmes, Tanner Williams, I65 And I165, Mobile Regional Airport, Wilmer, I10 And I65 and Alabama Port. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
